mapper.insert: insert into umorg (ORGID, ORGNAME, SHORTNAME, PARENTID, MEMO, ORGTYPE, SAPID, SHOWORDER, CREATEDATE, PARENTIDS, PARENTNAMES, LEAF, LEADER, PRINCIPAL, ORGATTRIBUTE, ORGCODE, PARENTTYPES, REFORGID, UM_ORGID, UM_MAIL_ORGID, del_flag, logo, class_type, grade ) values (#{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sapid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{parentids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentnames,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leaf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{principal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgattribute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parenttypes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reforgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{umOrgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{umMailOrgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update umorg set ORGNAME = #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHORTNAME = #{shortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENTID = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGTYPE = #{orgtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAPID = #{sapid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOWORDER = #{showorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PARENTIDS = #{parentids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENTNAMES = #{parentnames,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEAF = #{leaf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEADER = #{leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRINCIPAL = #{principal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGATTRIBUTE = #{orgattribute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGCODE = #{orgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENTTYPES = #{parenttypes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REFORGID = #{reforgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UM_ORGID = #{umOrgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UM_MAIL_ORGID = #{umMailOrgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_type = #{classType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ORGID = #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ORGID, ORGNAME, SHORTNAME, PARENTID, MEMO, ORGTYPE, SAPID, SHOWORDER, CREATEDATE, PARENTIDS, PARENTNAMES, LEAF, LEADER, PRINCIPAL, ORGATTRIBUTE, ORGCODE, PARENTTYPES, REFORGID, UM_ORGID, UM_MAIL_ORGID, del_flag, logo, class_type, grade from umorg where ORGID = #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ORGID, ORGNAME, SHORTNAME, PARENTID, MEMO, ORGTYPE, SAPID, SHOWORDER, CREATEDATE, PARENTIDS, PARENTNAMES, LEAF, LEADER, PRINCIPAL, ORGATTRIBUTE, ORGCODE, PARENTTYPES, REFORGID, UM_ORGID, UM_MAIL_ORGID, del_flag, logo, class_type, grade from umorg
